attributes.action: Help reform the British offshore islands
attributes.background: To make sure any investor in the British offshore islands is protected with a guaranteed TAL which a temporary advocates license which would enable any investor to acquire the service of a UK lawyer not just the islands own lawyers.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about who is able to practice law in the Crown Dependencies are a matter for the governments and parliamentary of these territories, not the UK Government or Parliament.
